short_summary: Request for Proposal against Supply Arrangement for office furniture from Environment and Climate Change Canada
description: This solicitation is for office furniture, which includes one or more of the following product categories:\\n\\- Interconnecting panels and freestanding systems;\\\n\\- Freestanding height-adjustable desk/table products;\\\n\\- Ancillary and lighting products;\\\n\\- Support space collaborative furniture.
full_summary:
# TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT BOOLEAN: MODERNIZATION PROJECT MONTRÉAL

**PROJECT DETAILS**
=================

Contract Reference: `cb-733-14797602`
Amendment Number: `8`

**TENDER DETAILS**
-----------------

* **Title:** Modernization Project Montreal
* **Publication Date:** January 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 22, 2024 at 14:00 hours
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 26, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** February 25, 2024

**Although this project is expired, we are offering the following details for general information purposes:**

## SCOPE OF WORK

The Environment and Climate Change Canada department is seeking the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for the Dominique-Ducharme Building, 105 McGill Street, 7th Floor, Montréal, QC H2Y 2E7.

## PROCUREMENT INFORMATION
---------------------------

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and more.
* **Notice Type:** RFP (Request for Proposal) against Supply Arrangement
* **Unspsc Classification:** 56101700 Office Furniture

## BACKGROUND
------------

This project is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.

**Business Needs:**

* Environment and Climate Change Canada has a requirement for office furniture.
* This requirement is for product categories 1 to 6, including interconnecting panels, freestanding systems, tables, ancillary and lighting products, and support space collaborative furniture.
* The requirement is subject to several trade agreements.

**Security Requirements:**

* Personnel may not enter sites where protected or classified information or assets are kept, without an escort provided by the responsible department.

## CONTACT INFORMATION
---------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Environment and Climate Change Canada
* **Contact Person:** Alexandra Ghiatau
* **Email:** [alexandra.ghiatau@ec.gc.ca](mailto:alexandra.
